# Simple Dev Tools

> A collection of developer accelerators and studios built with Next.js, React, and TailwindCSS. Provides in-browser utilities for engineers to prototype snippets, inspect schemas, validate security tokens, generate diagrams, and automate workflows.

Simple Dev Tools is a Next.js application hosted at `https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/` (production) that offers independent single-page tools with client-side interfaces. All tools run entirely in the browser with no authentication required. Built by Jonathan Reed at Hello.World Consulting using modern web technologies including Radix UI, shadcn/ui components, HTMX concepts, and various specialized libraries.

## Developer Accelerators

- [API Snippet Generator](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/api-snippet): Draft OpenAPI-driven code snippets for any stack on the fly. Upload Swagger/OpenAPI definitions and generate REST API client code.
- [Mermaid Editor](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/mermaid): Sketch sequence diagrams, flowcharts, and architecture visualizations quickly with live preview and export.
- [SQLite Playground](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/sqlite): Run SQL experiments with instant preview and persistence using sql.js in the browser.
- [Regex Lab](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/tools/regex): Iterate on regular expression patterns with explainers, tests, and sharing capabilities.
- [IDs & Scheduling](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/tools/ids-cron): Generate ULIDs, UUIDs, and human-friendly CRON expression helpers with descriptions.
- [Encoders & QR](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/tools/encode-qr): Encode/decode payloads (Base64, URL encoding), produce QR code assets (PNG/SVG), and inspect metadata.

## Studios

- [Schema & Types Studio](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/studio/schema): Convert sources between JSON Schema, TypeScript interfaces, Zod schemas, and preview Swagger documentation.
- [Security & Tokens](https://dev-tools.helloworldfirm.com/studio/security): Inspect JWTs, decode tokens, compute cryptographic hashes, and verify HMAC signatures using Web Crypto APIs.
